name: Dental Examination
description: Regular check-up and examination of teeth and gums

name: Teeth Cleaning
description: Professional cleaning to remove plaque and tartar

name: Cavity Filling
description: Filling a cavity with composite resin material

name: Root Canal
description: Treatment to repair and save a badly damaged or infected tooth

name: Tooth Extraction
description: Removal of a tooth from its socket in the bone

name: Crown Placement
description: Placement of a crown to restore a damaged or missing tooth

name: Dental Implant
description: Surgical placement of a dental implant

name: Dental Bridge
description: Installation of a dental bridge to replace missing teeth

name: Teeth Whitening
description: Professional whitening treatment to improve tooth color

name: Fluoride Treatment
description: Application of fluoride to strengthen tooth enamel

name: Denture Fitting
description: Fitting of full or partial dentures
